tool_description: If you want to save time reading only the main information from a large text (articles, news, e-mails, for example), this API is for you. Load the full text and this API will return the main topics of the original text. The number of topics will depend on the size of the original text.
name: Text Highlights

import requests

url = "https://text-highlights.p.rapidapi.com/highlights"

headers = {

        }
